response.explain: The execution error indicates that the robot is not within four meters of the object it is trying to interact with. This means that the robot needs to move closer to the object before it can perform the action.
response.subtask:
(1) Register the objects: pottable_marigold_275 and plant_pot_278.
(2) Move the robot to the pottable marigold.
(3) Grasp the pottable marigold.
(4) Move the robot to the plant pot.
(5) Put the pottable marigold in the plant pot.
response.code:
def act(robot,env,camera):
